attributes.action: Force BSKYB to create an across the board pricing scheme for the licenced trade as with private dwellings.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This move would then allow more pubs and clubs to purchase a Sky subscription and not install a foreign system or use a non licenced card to recieve the channels. This would then help the pubs and clubs to atract more people and sustain their trade whilst people adjust to the smoking ban.
